# SLOT MACHINE GAME!

Greetings, this is just an easy project about slot machine game. It was written in Python.
I made it to improve my understanding in Python! ENJOY : )

# Table Of Contents
- [Game Rules](#game-rules)
- [Installing](#installing)
- [Credits](#credits)

# Games Rules
The Rules here are simple :

- You can customize the number of rows and column in your slot machine (I set the base parameters to 3).
- There're 4 symbols in the slot machine which are ["A", "B", "C", "D"] which you can customize it as well.
- Each symbol contain different rarity in them so the amount of value when jackpot occur will be different.
- There're minimum and maximum betting which by default are $1 and $100 in order (customizable)
- To win you must get the same symbol on the same row you bet on (The number of rows you bet on start from the TOP).
- For Example in 3 x 3 slot machine if you bet 2 lines it means you bet on the top row and the middle row.

# Installing

```bash
pip install "git+https://github.com/ImtaeZ/Slot-Machine-by-ImtaeZ.git"
```
